entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
